meta-review.comment: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged brings the high-octane fun of the original and revs it up with improved racing mechanics and added vehicle classes. While it doesn't reinvent the wheel, the expanded events and multiplayer modes offer a fuller gaming experience. The nostalgic joy of burning rubber on orange tracks still delivers, but the limited environments and conservative controls keep this sequel from racing to the top of the podium.
